footer.tagline: A simple, block-based static site generator

home.title: Build Static Sites with Blocks
home.description: A modern, simple static site generator with block-based architecture, built-in i18n support, and zero runtime JavaScript required.
home.why_subtitle: Everything you need to build modern static websites
home.quick_example_description: Define pages with YAML and compose them from reusable blocks

blocks.title: Block-Based Architecture
blocks.description: Build pages by composing reusable blocks. Each block is a simple HTML file with props.

i18n.title: Built-in i18n
i18n.description: Multi-language support out of the box. Define translations and generate pages for each locale automatically.

typescript.title: TypeScript-Based
typescript.description: Built with TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience. CLI and core are fully typed.

fast.title: Fast Builds
fast.description: Optimized build process with esbuild for JavaScript bundling. Watch mode with instant rebuilds.

seo.title: SEO-Optimized
seo.description: Automatic sitemap generation, meta tags, Open Graph, and robots.txt for better search engine visibility.

zero_js.title: Zero Runtime JS
zero_js.description: Generate pure HTML/CSS. Add JavaScript only where needed with automatic bundling.
